item.description:
Before signing up for this Meetup please read the entire write up. By signing up for this event you agree to the terms of the liability waiver below.

Well it looks as though we are finally going to get some warmer temps this week. Why not blow the dust and cobwebs off the bike and join me for a ride down the East Bay Bike Path. We will head South from Shaw's parking lot to Bristol. We will take a spin through Colt State Park and then head back. Sunset is 7:20ish. It would be a good idea to bring a head lamp if you don't have a light on your bike. This is my 1st ride this season. That being said we will ride at average speed of 13 mph overall. The entire ride should be about 15- 16 miles.Make sure you have a wind layer for when temps start to cool down. Everyone  really sholuld be carrying a spare tube or patch kit and a pump..YOU NEVER KNOW!  You may want a light pair of gloves as well. Bring water and snacks.  Hope to see you Wednsday.
